ygData.subject: Re: New Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Alrighty then.  If anyone is on Solusek Ro in the Rivervale area, I will be travelling to Freeport sometime today and looking for company/guides.  Binding
ygData.messageBody:
> YES you can buy Robes in Freeport at the Academy .. . (wiz,mag,enc)
> the Sr. Apprentice robe is violet in color and I bought it
> for about 4PP and
> change.

Alrighty then. If anyone is on Solusek Ro in the Rivervale area, I
will be travelling to Freeport sometime today and looking for
company/guides. Binding is provided along the way. Email me (or
/tell Aznyin) if you want to come along to help a poor wizard who lost
everything! (Dontcha feel sorry for me? *grin*)

Aznyin
Level 12 Erudite Wizard
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
